name: Reverse Psychological Warfare Against PSNs
description: Advanced psychological manipulation techniques to flip the power dynamic and disrupt PSN influence.
focus: Forcing PSNs into Defensive Psychological States

cards.title: Inducing Cognitive Dissonance
cards.description: Breaking PSN mental frameworks by injecting conflicting ideas.
bulletpoints: Introducing contradictory narratives forces PSNs into psychological instability.
Exposing their own words against them disrupts their cognitive control over targets.
Layering opposing perspectives into discussions weakens their manipulative grip.
cards.summaryText: Flood them with contradictions and mirrored quotes until their narrative scaffolding collapses.

cards.title: Forced Identity Reassessment
cards.description: Undermining PSN ego structures by attacking their self-constructed personas.
bulletpoints: Challenging their projected superiority creates psychological cracks in their facade.
Exploiting their need for validation destabilizes their confidence in social dominance.
Reframing their narratives forces them to reassess their own manipulative strategies.
cards.summaryText: Question their supremacy, starve their validation, and recast their story until the persona fractures.

cards.title: Confusion Loops and Logic Traps
cards.description: Forcing PSNs into mental loops that exhaust their control mechanisms.
bulletpoints: Using paradoxical statements forces them to contradict themselves.
Baiting them into defending illogical premises drains their mental energy.
Setting up logic traps exposes their inability to maintain a consistent narrative.
cards.summaryText: Spin them into paradoxes and logic traps until their control loops burn out.
